statements: SELECT * FROM SalaryData;
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, years_of_experience FROM SalaryData;
SELECT * FROM SalaryData WHERE industry = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, target_salary, years_of_experience FROM SalaryData WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT employee_id, target_salary, industry FROM SalaryData WHERE current_salary < 60000;
SELECT * FROM SalaryData WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, years_of_experience FROM SalaryData WHERE industry = 'IT' ORDER BY current_salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, target_salary FROM SalaryData WHERE years_of_experience <= 5 AND industry = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, target_salary, years_of_experience FROM SalaryData WHERE current_salary > 80000 AND years_of_experience BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY years_of_experience ASC;
SELECT industry, SUM(current_salary) AS total_salaries FROM SalaryData GROUP BY industry HAVING COUNT(employee_id) >= 3 ORDER BY total_salaries DESC;
SELECT * FROM salary_data;
SELECT employee_id, current_salary FROM salary_data WHERE years_experience > 5 ORDER BY current_salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, years_experience FROM salary_data WHERE current_salary > 75000;
SELECT * FROM job_transitions WHERE previous_salary < new_salary;
SELECT employee_id, previous_job_title, new_job_title FROM job_transitions ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, years_experience FROM salary_data WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM salary_data ORDER BY current_salary DESC
SELECT new_job_title, new_salary FROM job_transitions WHERE previous_salary < 50000
SELECT employee_id, current_salary, years_experience FROM salary_data WHERE years_experience > 5
SELECT employee_id, previous_job_title, new_job_title FROM job_transitions ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM salary_data
SELECT job_title, current_salary FROM salary_data WHERE current_salary > 50000
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM salary_data ORDER BY job_title DESC
SELECT * FROM job_transitions ORDER BY transition_date DESC
SELECT id, negotiation_date, negotiation_outcome FROM negotiation_records WHERE negotiation_outcome = 'Accepted'
SELECT * FROM salary_data WHERE current_salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM salary_data WHERE job_title = 'Manager' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT id, previous_job_title, new_job_title, salary_increase FROM job_transitions WHERE salary_increase >= 1000 ORDER BY transition_date DESC;
SELECT negotiation_type, negotiation_outcome, negotiated_by FROM negotiation_records WHERE negotiation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY negotiation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM salary_data JOIN job_transitions ON salary_data.id = job_transitions.employee_id WHERE salary_increase > 5000 ORDER BY hire_date DESC, transition_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT name, job_title FROM employee WHERE current_salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, name, current_salary FROM employee ORDER BY current_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM compensation_data WHERE reported_salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000;
SELECT job_id, start_date, previous_job_title FROM job_history WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee ORDER BY name ASC, current_salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, job_title FROM employee WHERE current_salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, name, current_salary FROM employee WHERE job_title LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY current_salary DESC;
SELECT e.name, j.start_date, j.end_date, j.previous_salary FROM employee e JOIN job_history j ON e.employee_id = j.employee_id ORDER BY e.name ASC, j.end_date DESC;

SELECT c.employee_id, c.date_reported, c.reported_salary, c.negotiation_notes FROM compensation_data c JOIN employee e ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE e.job_title = 'Engineer' ORDER BY c.date_reported DESC;
SELECT * FROM salary_data;
SELECT employee_name, current_salary FROM salary_data WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT job_title, AVG(current_salary) AS average_salary FROM salary_data GROUP BY job_title;
SELECT * FROM job_transitions ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, years_of_experience FROM salary_data WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM salary_data WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY current_salary DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT job_title, AVG(current_salary) AS avg_salary FROM salary_data GROUP BY job_title HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM job_transitions WHERE previous_job_title <> new_job_title AND new_salary > 70000 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_name, negotiated_salary FROM negotiation_history WHERE negotiation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY negotiated_salary DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, current_salary, comparison_salary FROM salary_comparison WHERE current_salary > comparison_salary ORDER BY comparison_salary ASC LIMIT 10;
